typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.V_semdenot_word_fs_v_semdenot_word_fs_type
typeDescription.description: severity of error on semantically wrong word or FS

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.V_semdenot_word_fs_v_semdenot_word_fs_range
typeDescription.description: semantically wrong word or FS: which of the two

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.V_FS_form_v_fs_form_type
typeDescription.description: choice, omission, addition if a formulaic sequence is formally incorrect

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.V_FS_v_fs_type
typeDescription.description: FS is incorrect with regard to its formal elements

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.V_Wordform_v_wordform_type
typeDescription.description: word formation problem: derivation or composition/compounding (no inflectional errors!)

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.V_semconn_at_word_fs_v_semconn_at_word_fs_range
typeDescription.description: odd connotation

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.V_semimprec_v_semimprec_range
typeDescription.description: imprecision, oddness of lexical choice: word or formulaic sequence

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.S_Var_s_var_partik_type
typeDescription.description: correctness of particle use

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.S_Var_s_var_type
typeDescription.description: language specific variation (for DE e.g. particles and verb order with weil)

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.S_Txt_s_txt_type
typeDescription.description: TEXT TYPE specific elements: grfw = greetings and farewells; opcl = openings and closings

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.S_Form_s_form_type
typeDescription.description: sociolinguistics formality: form of address; generally inadequate formality

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.V_form_word_fs_nonexist_v_form_word_fs_nonexist_range
typeDescription.description: Annotation of nonexisting verbs or formulaic sequences

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.P_Request_p_request_type
typeDescription.description: Annotation of requests and their types

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.O_Graph_o_graph_graphgen_act_type
typeDescription.description: Ortho error: type of grapheme error : omission, wrong choice , addition

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.O_Graph_o_graph_type
typeDescription.description: Ortho error: transposition or general grapeheme error; error cateegory does not apply to inflectional suffixes.

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.O_Wordbd_o_wordbd_type
typeDescription.description: Ortho error: word boundaries

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.O_Punct_o_punct_type
typeDescription.description: Ortho error: Punctuation ( omission , extra, wrong type)

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.O_Apostr_o_apostr_type
typeDescription.description: Ortho error: Apostrophe

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.H_Intelltxt_intelltxt_type
typeDescription.description: intelligibility of text

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.H_Intellts_intellts_type
typeDescription.description: intelligibility of sentences

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Verb_main_g_verb_main_type
typeDescription.description: missing or redundant main verb

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Verb_g_verb_type
typeDescription.description: verb feature error

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Verb_compl_g_verb_compl_type
typeDescription.description: complex verb form / verbal complex error

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Valency_g_valency_type
typeDescription.description: valency error

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Refl_g_refl_type
typeDescription.description: marker of reflexive pronoun error

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Refl_g_refl_pronrefl_type
typeDescription.description: type of reflexive pronoun error

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.C_Con_accur_c_con_accur_type
typeDescription.description: type of incorrect connector use

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.C_Con_accur_c_con_accur_correct_type
typeDescription.description: severity: 0 or 1

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Neg_g_neg_type
typeDescription.description: type of negation (usu general = neggen, but in theory there could be a double negation error)

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Neg_g_neg_neggen_type
typeDescription.description: type of general negation error: addition, omission, wrong pos, wrong use

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Inflect_Inexist_g_inflect_inexist_type
typeDescription.description: inflectional form that is not existent in paradigm; value records the POS of the token

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Morphol_Wrong_g_morphol_wrong_type
typeDescription.description: annotation of non-standard morphology (case, number, gender)

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Art_g_art_type
typeDescription.description: annotation of non-standard (non)use of articles

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Conj_g_conj_type
typeDescription.description: annotation of non-standard use of conjunctions

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Prep_g_prep_type
typeDescription.description: annotation of non-standard (non)use of prepositions

typeDescription.name: org.dakoda.merlin.Mmax2.G_Wo_g_wo_type
typeDescription.description: annotation of non-standard (non)use of word order
